description.h2: A link:footnoteLink element must have no children other than link:loc, link:footnote, and link:footnoteArc.
description.p: Although valid XBRL 2.1, custom elements in the substitution groups of link:loc, link:footnote or link:footnoteArc have no value to users.

REMARK: Although these variations each show only one error code, depending on a vendors' implementation, validation errors may occur prior to the error listed, or other errors may cascade after Footnote-Substitution-Group. In particular, the schema fales of the ng variations should throw error 6.7.27 because they use a substitutionGroup disallowed by that rule; the point being that 6.7.27 would not apply to a standard taxonomy but 6.5.27 would still be an error. As long as all variations marked NOGOOD are rejected because of the disallowed substitutionGroup, a validator may be considered as legitimately passing this testcase.

variation.name: 6.5.27 Instance footnote contains a link:documentation element, NOGOOD
variation.description: Instance footnote contains a link:documentation element, NOGOOD

variation.name: 6.5.27 Instance footnote contains an footsub:Arc in place of a link:footnoteArc, NOGOOD
variation.description: Instance footnote contains an footsub:Arc in place of a link:footnoteArc, which MAY also cause an XBRL 2.1 validation error because the fact-footnote arc appears on an element other than link:footnote, or error Substitution-Group-Custom. NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.5.27 Instance footnote contains an footsub:Title element, NOGOOD
variation.description: Instance footnote contains an footsub:Title element, this MAY also cause error Substitution-Group-Custom, NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.5.27 Instance footnote contains an footsub:Loc in place of a link:loc, NOGOOD
variation.description: Instance footnote contains an footsub:Loc in place of a link:loc. This MAY cause other cascading errors such as an XLink unresolvable arc label, or a Dangling-Footnote error, or Substitution-Group-Custom. NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.5.27 Instance footnote contains an (empty) footsub:Footnote in place of a link:footnote, NOGOOD
variation.description: Instance footnote contains an (empty) footsub:Footnote in place of a link:footnote, this MAY also cause error Substitution-Group-Custom. NOGOOD.
